sn_aia_usecase.base_plan:
This team can interact with IT liaisons to find an application that the end user wants to create a playbook for. Once found this team will further assis by listing the services that are part of that application and allowing the user to select one of those to build a playbook for. Finally the team will present a link for the user to create the playbook draft.
Complete the steps in this order: 1. Find the factory application built by the digital product factory requested item given that items sys_id 2. Once the application is found, get the services that are contained within it and present them in a list 3. Prompt the user to choose one of the services to build a playbook for 4. Build a prompt that will be used to build the playbook draft 4. Generate the playbook URL and present it to the user so they may launch it
sn_aia_usecase.description: Aid an IT liaison in taking steps to create a set of agent instructions for a given case and building those instructions into a playbook.
sn_aia_usecase.name: Playbook Assistant for Digital Product Factory
sn_aia_usecase.sys_name: Playbook Assistant for Digital Product Factory

team.display_value: Playbook Assistant for Digital Product Factory
